text: @MattHancock It’s not safe for the shielded. What @MattHancock means is that there are @NHSuk beds available if you get Covid-19 but your chances of survival are known to be lower than the non-shielded. Your scientists have told you this but seems you’ve gagged or ignored them @BorisJohnson
